headline: Why Is Wabtec (WAB) Stock Rocketing Higher Today
summary: Shares of rail equipment company Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies (NYSE:WAB) jumped 5.9% in the afternoon session after the company announced a landmark $4.2 billion locomotive order from Kazakhstan's national railway, marking the largest contract in the company's history.

raw.headline: Why Is Wabtec (WAB) Stock Rocketing Higher Today
raw.summary: Shares of rail equipment company Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies (NYSE:WAB) jumped 5.9% in the afternoon session after the company announced a landmark $4.2 billion locomotive order from Kazakhstan's national railway, marking the largest contract in the company's history.

headline: Wabtec, Kazakhstan National Railway in $4.2 Billion Locomotive Deal After Trump Call
summary: The transport-technology company said it would deliver locomotives from its Evolution Series and provide long-term service support, including fleet maintenance.

raw.headline: Wabtec, Kazakhstan National Railway in $4.2 Billion Locomotive Deal After Trump Call
raw.summary: The transport-technology company said it would deliver locomotives from its Evolution Series and provide long-term service support, including fleet maintenance.

headline: Kazakhstan Awards Wabtec a $4.2 Billion Locomotive Order
summary: PITTSBURGH, September 22, 2025--Wabtec Corporation (NYSE: WAB) announced today a landmark agreement with National Company Kazakhstan Temir Zholy (KTZ), the national railway of Kazakhstan, to deliver Evolution Series locomotives and provide long-term service support. The multi-year order, valued at $4.2 billion, marks the largest locomotive agreement in Wabtec’s history.

raw.headline: Kazakhstan Awards Wabtec a $4.2 Billion Locomotive Order

The multi-year order, valued at $4.2 billion, marks the largest locomotive agreement in Wabtec’s history.

headline: 3 Stocks From the Transport Equipment & Leasing Industry to Watch
summary: Headwinds, including inflation, tariff-related tensions, and lingering supply-chain disruptions, hurt the Zacks Transportation - Equipment and Leasing industry. WAB, R and GBX are likely to stand out.
